feauture.title: New Feature
feauture.article: Option to take two photos and overlay the double exposure effect. Timer trigger. Flash. Grid assistant for taking pictures. Fisheye lens.

tip1.title: About Daazz Cam
tip1.article: Daazz Camera is an application for Android devices that includes a useful collection of filters inspired by the 80s cinema and tools for further editing, If you love retro-style photos that take you back in time, Dazz Cam is the app for you.

tip2.title: Real-time filters and editing tools
tip2.article: The camera has a selection of filters and settings that can be applied in real-time, so it is possible to preview the result of the image before taking it. it offers a series of editing tools that let you make different adjustments to adapt the result to your liking.

tip3.title: Our Best Tips and Tricks
tip3.article: features a wide selection of retro-style filters inspired by the film cameras of the 1980s, giving images the color, texture, and noise of film productions of yesteryear. It has a very basic and simple user interface, and in addition, features .Different color flashes.

tip4.title: How To Move From Beginner To Expert
tip4.article: There are 13 vintage camera replicas for stills and six for video included with the fully unlocked Pro version of the app, and they cover quite a lot of ground. On the video front you get the likes of VHS, 16mm, and 8mm options among others. On the photo front, there are such oddities as a pleasingly lurching 3D camera and a rudimentary split camera alongside the more conventional vintage grainy selection.
